name: Time traveller (mariavllr)
description:
Time Traveller is a web game that I developed with 2 other people for a class project. It is made in Javascript using Phaser. The game is about a travel in history, starting in the Prehistory, then Middle Age and finally actual time. You have to scroll through platforms, jump avoid enemies, answer questions...

This game and another 2 games won the best games of that year in my class.
